course_title: Topics in Biomedical Informatics: Biomedical Image Analysis
class_notes:
This course focuses on computational analytic and interpretive approaches to optimize extraction and use of biological and clinical imaging data for diagnostic and therapeutic translational medical applications.


We will make special accommodations for online instruction for this course. Your instructor will communicate the mode of instruction before the start of classes.
course_description: This is a special topics course in Biomedical Informatics.
sections: Class Nbr: 4752, Section #: 4, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: X. Yang, Status: Open
